citeinfo.origin: USDA Forest Service, Chugach National Forest
citeinfo.title: Inventory Database (Vegetation) - CNF

descript.abstract: Data Type: Vegetation/Land Cover/Soils; The primary theme in this database is vegetation, however many other themes are used in developing the inventory process. Older inventories were aimed at timber resource, however recent and current inventories are integrated and many variables are recorded in inventory databases and will be considered in reports. Preliminary sample phases include land cover classifications developed by DNR for Bristol Bay, Chugach National Forest for some, etc. The inventories included in this database which pertain to the oil spill affected area are: the Kenai Peninsula Inventory, 1987; Prince William Sound/Afognak Island Inventory, 1978; Copper River Inventory, in progress; Southwest and Southeast Alaska Inventory, in progress. Field Inventories in the Tongass National Forest lands began in 1995.

idinfo.accconst: Availability is dependent upon the information requested.
idinfo.useconst: Format is conventional. Conversion issues arise along the lines of data age.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
